dict.acceptation: 爆裂，炸破；使爆炸；充满，塞满；爆发；
使爆炸；冲破，胀破；分帧，分页，分隔；

sent.orig: AF was induced by programmable stimulation combined with burst stimulation and was recorded on ECG.
sent.trans: 程序刺激结合Burst刺激对上述心房部位进行AF诱发，记录AF的发生率。

sent.orig: As for its electric indexes, PCI bus sets burst data-transmission as default mode.
sent.trans: 在电器指标上，PCI总线采用突发数据传输burst)为缺省方式。

sent.orig: The DDR memory controller is used in simply burst read and burst write mode.
sent.trans: 双倍资料率记忆体控制器用于简易地爆发读取和写入模式。

sent.orig: We burst out laughing; I hate you, she burst out.
sent.trans: 他憋了很久的笑终于爆发了出来。
